person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The nominees , according to diplomats , are : Kofi Annan of Ghana , the U.N. undersecretary-general for peacekeeping ; Ahmedou Ould Abdallah of Mauritania , the former U.N. special envoy for Burundi ; Amara Essy of the Ivory Coast , its foreign minister and the U.N. General Assembly president in 1994-95 ; and Hamid Algabid of Niger , the secretary-general of the Organisation of the Islamic Conference .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| Kofi Annan of Ghana |
| the U.N. undersecretary-general for peacekeeping | (This is a position, not a person. No need to include it.)
| Ahmedou Ould Abdallah of Mauritania |
| the former U.N. special envoy for Burundi |
| Amara Essy of the Ivory Coast |
| its foreign minister | (This is a position, not a person. No need to include it.)
| and the U.N. General Assembly president in 1994-95 | (This is a position, not a person. No need to include it.)
| Hamid Algabid of Niger |
| the secretary-general of the Organisation of the Islamic Conference |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Kofi Annan of Ghana |
| Ahmedou Ould Abdallah of Mauritania |
| Amara Essy of the Ivory Coast |
| Hamid Algabid of Niger |

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The nominees , according to diplomats , are : Kofi Annan of Ghana , the U.N. undersecretary-general for peacekeeping ; Ahmedou Ould Abdallah of Mauritania , the former U.N. special envoy for Burundi ; Amara Essy of the Ivory Coast , its foreign minister and the U.N. General Assembly president in 1994-95 ; and Hamid Algabid of Niger , the secretary-general of the Organisation of the Islamic Conference .

Let's think step by step.

| Location |
| --- |
| Ghana |
| Mauritania |
| Ivory Coast |
| United Nations (UN) |
| Burundi |

The entities identified are countries (Ghana, Mauritania, Ivory Coast) and organizations (United Nations, Organisation of the Islamic Conference). The specific locations within the organizations (UN: undersecretary-general for peacekeeping, former U.N. special envoy, U.N. General Assembly president, secretary-general) are not considered separate locations in this context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location |
| --- |
| Ghana (Kofi Annan is from) |
| Mauritania (Ahmedou Ould Abdallah is from) |
| Ivory Coast |
| United Nations (UN) (mentioned as an organization) |
| Burundi (context of former U.N. special envoy) |

The entities identified are countries (Ghana, Mauritania, Ivory Coast) and the United Nations as an organization. The specific roles within the United Nations (undersecretary-general for peacekeeping, former U.N. special envoy, U.N. General Assembly president) are not considered separate locations in this context.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The nominees , according to diplomats , are : Kofi Annan of Ghana , the U.N. undersecretary-general for peacekeeping ; Ahmedou Ould Abdallah of Mauritania , the former U.N. special envoy for Burundi ; Amara Essy of the Ivory Coast , its foreign minister and the U.N. General Assembly president in 1994-95 ; and Hamid Algabid of Niger , the secretary-general of the Organisation of the Islamic Conference .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| U.N. (United Nations) |
| U.N. General Assembly |
| U.N. undersecretary-general for peacekeeping |
| U.N. special envoy for Burundi |
| Ivory Coast |
| Organisation of the Islamic Conference |

The entities identified as organizations in the paragraph are the United Nations (U.N.), the U.N. General Assembly, the U.N. undersecretary-general for peacekeeping, the U.N. special envoy for Burundi, Ivory Coast, and the Organisation of the Islamic Conference.

| Organization |
| --- |

| U.N. General Assembly |
| U.N. undersecretary-general for peacekeeping |
| U.N. (Organization) |  (Added "U.N." for clarity)
| Organisation of the Islamic Conference |

The entities identified as organizations in the paragraph are the United Nations (U.N.), the U.N. General Assembly, the U.N. undersecretary-general for peacekeeping, and the Organisation of the Islamic Conference. The term "U.N." was added for clarity to the "U.N. organization" mentioned as the employer of Kofi Annan and Ahmedou Ould Abdallah.
